Introduction:

PyPontem is a Python-based library designed for postprocessing of simulation outputs generated by OLGA. The package aims to streamline data extraction, organization, and analysis for flow assurance engineers

Key Features:

  1. Extracting metadata (version, title, author, etc.)
  2. Identifying branch names and retrieving branch elevation profiles
  3. Search variable catalogs based on name, location, or pipe
  4. Extracting trend data from TPLs
  5. Extracting profile data from PPLs
  6. Robust unit conversion
